favourite.article: This song was on a printout we had in our meeting this morning. Lord Jesus lovely Bridegroom we Love You.
I love this hymn. Praise the Lord for His eternal purpose to have the Church!!
The hymn has portrayed what was on God's heart from eternity to eternity. May we all enter into the satisfaction of God's heart!

What a sweet song manifesting the mystery in God's heart with His love for Christ and the church, and His desire to joined with redeemed, transformed, and glorified man as the lovely Bride matching Christ the Beloved Bridegroom! Praise the Lord for God's heart's desire and for His economy in Christ and the church to carry out His desire. O Lord make us those who live according to Your heart's desire everyday! We love You Bridegroom Jesus!
